organism.scientificName: Saccharolobus shibatae (strain ATCC 51178 / DSM 5389 / JCM 8931 / NBRC 15437 / B12)

texts.value: DNA-dependent RNA polymerase (RNAP) catalyzes the transcription of DNA into RNA using the four ribonucleoside triphosphates as substrates. Forms the clamp head domain

Part of the 13-subunit RNA polymerase complex (PubMed:19419240, PubMed:21265742, PubMed:22848102). Rpo1N and Rpo5 form a cleft which docks Rpo13. Interacts with Rpo8 on the periphery of the clamp head (PubMed:19419240, PubMed:21265742, PubMed:22848102)
Corresponds to about the first two-thirds of the bacterial beta' subunit
Belongs to the RNA polymerase beta' chain family

citation.title: Evolution of complex RNA polymerases: the complete archaeal RNA polymerase structure.

referencePositions: X-RAY CRYSTALLOGRAPHY (3.35 ANGSTROMS) OF THE RNA POLYMERASE COMPLEX IN COMPLEX WITH MAGNESIUM AND ZINC

citation.title: New insights into the diversity and evolution of the archaeal mobilome from three complete genomes of Saccharolobus shibatae.
